title: Principal Message 3/21
description: Dear Jahn Families, Thank you to our amazing school community for all of your support. We appreciate your partnership and collaboration! Preschool registration will open on April 19th through Chicago Early Learning. Audubon Elementary School is opening up a new early childhood center, and they are hosting an informational meeting on March 25th at 5pm via Zoom. CPS is still looking to hire a crossing guard for the intersection of Belmont and Wolcott. See this flyer for details and how to apply. Jahn continues to offer free COVID19 testing to students and staff on a weekly basis. Our regular testing day is Tuesday, unless there is a schedule change. Thank you to Mrs. Rendleman for leading the efforts to increase our vaccination and testing percentages at school. If you are interested in signing up to provide consent for your child to test, review this COVID19 testing flyer for more information. Please welcome Coach Crystal as our new recess coordinator! With the weather warming up, she has put together an Amazon wish list for some fun new recess equipment. We appreciate any donations our community is able to provide! Have a great week! Sincerely, Michael Herring Principal
cleaned_text: Dear Jahn Families, Thank you to our amazing school community for all of your support. We appreciate your partnership and collaboration! Preschool registration will open on April 19th through [Chicago Early Learning](https://www.chicago.gov/city/en/sites/chicagoearlylearning/home.html). Audubon Elementary School is opening up a new [early childhood center](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ArelcK-IcYW4ATaYpGIxqE3z4DbJAw72/view?usp=sharing), and they are hosting an informational meeting on March 25th at 5pm via Zoom. CPS is still looking to hire a crossing guard for the intersection of Belmont and Wolcott. See [this flyer ](https://drive.google.com/file/d/17RATogZh6ktzjG5imx6mtwtn8IX8rNyT/view?usp=sharing)for details and how to apply. Jahn continues to offer free COVID19 testing to students and staff on a weekly basis. Our regular testing day is Tuesday, unless there is a schedule change. Thank you to Mrs. Rendleman for leading the efforts to increase our vaccination and testing percentages at school. If you are interested in signing up to provide consent for your child to test, review this [COVID19 testing flyer](https://drive.google.com/file/d/13Wo8Dd2oPyerlbJogQwoXf9wCeBok32H/view?usp=sharing) for more information. Please welcome Coach Crystal as our new recess coordinator! With the weather warming up, she has put together an [Amazon wish list](https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/300AR1OA9EQG0?ref=cm_sw_em_r_un_un_HeYfSOdaoZ26H) for some fun new recess equipment. We appreciate any donations our community is able to provide! Have a great week! Sincerely, Michael Herring Principal 25 de marzo a través de Zoom. martes los Herring Director
